query: Set up the config system for the gateway — JSON5 loading with Zod validation and defaults
expected_behavior: Creates packages/config/src/schema.ts with Zod schemas for gateway, agent, channel, plugin config
Creates packages/config/src/loader.ts that reads JSON5 files and merges config layers in order: defaults → global → workspace → env
Creates packages/config/src/defaults.ts with sensible default values
Config loaded from ~/.openclaw-clone/config.json5 and ./config.json5 correctly overrides defaults
Invalid config (bad Zod type) throws a descriptive validation error, not an unhandled crash
